Posts.Content: Jun 6, 2016 06:03AM mykidshavepaws wrote: Hi ladies!  Sorry I'm coming to the group late...my big computer is upstairs and I have a hard time getting long posts done on my phone.  Joined the site a couple of weeks ago and just now was able to figure out how to get my diagnosis and treatment info into my siggy and now it is time to start work.  Will be back later when I can do a proper intro and read up on all your stories.  But I wanted to at least acknowledge I'm part of the group and be able to find you all again.  Oh, and I have my second infusion on Wed so may be posting/reading then.
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo May 2016 OAJ2013 salve777
